> > "Still awaiting orders, what should I do with these here 2?"
> Burning Hammer
> > asks Zardus...
>

{Scorpina}

    Claws clacking in anger Scorpina resumed her bot mode listening to
Zardus tell the bots to prepare for battle, her rockets were still reloading
so she reached back unhooking her beast modes tail, flipping down a handle
and trigger. A canister of purplish goo ejects from the back of the weapon
and the fem bot replaces it with a dull green goo.

    As the enemy attacked she turned cocking the weapon and firing a stream
of acidic goo at the intruder Airbomber...
